trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning Batch Scoring Activity
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning Batch Scoring Activity

trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="24a732f3-38d7-466b-8e1e-7a232ffdce2e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Machine Learning Batch Scoring Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="24a732f3-38d7-466b-8e1e-7a232ffdce2e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Machine Learning Batch Scoring Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: A predictive pipeline has these parts.
trans-unit.target: A predictive pipeline has these parts.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="8e3cee3a-7757-4824-857e-17ed7c1bf27d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Storage Linked Service</link> and <link xlink:href="c0e4b47e-0d70-4655-a179-e0558d80c4a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Machine Learning Linked Service</link>.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="8e3cee3a-7757-4824-857e-17ed7c1bf27d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Storage Linked Service</link> and <link xlink:href="c0e4b47e-0d70-4655-a179-e0558d80c4a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Machine Learning Linked Service</link>.

trans-unit.source: A pipeline with <embeddedLabel>Azure ML Batch Scoring Activity</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: A pipeline with <embeddedLabel>Azure ML Batch Scoring Activity</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The following sample pipeline containing an <embeddedLabel>AzureMLBatchScoringActivity</embeddedLabel> gets the location of the input file from your input tables, invoke the Azure Machine Learning batch scoring API, and copy the batch scoring output to the blob specified in your output table definition.
trans-unit.target: The following sample pipeline containing an <embeddedLabel>AzureMLBatchScoringActivity</embeddedLabel> gets the location of the input file from your input tables, invoke the Azure Machine Learning batch scoring API, and copy the batch scoring output to the blob specified in your output table definition.

trans-unit.source: An AzureMLBatchScoringActivity can have only one input and one output table.
trans-unit.target: An AzureMLBatchScoringActivity can have only one input and one output table.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>Create Predictive Pipelines using Azure Data Factory and Azure Machine Learning</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/data-factory-create-predictive-pipelines/</linkUri></externalLink> for more details and a walkthrough.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>Create Predictive Pipelines using Azure Data Factory and Azure Machine Learning</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/data-factory-create-predictive-pipelines/</linkUri></externalLink> for more details and a walkthrough.
